oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Local paper. Paper discolored, water-stained, frayed edges; ff. 1-2 in poor condition.
Pamphlet binding, single section, sewn through fold; covers missing.
Written in black ink, 6-13 lines per page. Folios sanded to prevent ink runs.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
